description:
At Evans Moore, LLC, our award-winning team of attorneys successfully battles for maximum compensation in personal injury cases. Our law firm, in Charleston, South Carolina, has a proven track record of returning six- and seven-figure awards to people. Some of our accomplishments include the following:

  • $1.2 million in a case involving prison misconduct
  • A $1.125 million settlement in a wrongful death case
  • A $900,000 settlement in a sexual harassment matter
  • $97.5 million following a wrongful death during a police shooting

If you have experienced the unthinkable, our team provides the support you need. From the free initial consultation, we work collaboratively with you to ensure that your needs are met and your questions are answered. Our attorneys can meet with you virtually, at our law firm or wherever is convenient for you. We want to take on the legal burdens so that you can focus solely on your recovery.

The attorneys at Evans Moore, LLC, have earned a number of honors, such as being named in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best for Client Satisfaction; being listed in the American Society of Legal Advocates' Top 40 Lawyers Under 40; each being included in South Carolina Super Lawyers and Rising Stars for multiple years; and being selected for inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America. Our law firm serves clients throughout the state.

The Best Lawyers in America 2013. Copyright 2012 by Woodward/White, Inc., Aiken, SC
